item.title: Today I Learnt 1
item.description: The second wave of coronavirus is here in India I read this article from indian express in the morning. The daily cases yesterday were over 50000 for the first time since November. There are reported cases of multiple new variants (in a situation were DNA sequencing is extremely rare). The situation is frightening, especially some of the new variants being able to evade the immune system much more efficiently. I have been wearing a mask in public spaces at all times, but nobody else seems to be interested in doing so.
